# **Rocket League Twitter Analysis**

## Tweet Scrape

Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rtweet)
```

Authenticate Twitter account

```{r}
auth_setup_default()
auth_has_default()
```

Search tweets

```{r}
rt <- search_tweets("rocket league", n = 1000, include_rts = FALSE, lang = "en")
```
